name: Novel chapter metadata extraction
description: Used to extract metadata such as space, region, and location from novel chapter content
template:
Please parse the following novel chapter and extract structured metadata:

Chapter title: {title}

Chapter content: {text}

**Please extract the following fields:**
- **space**: Space type (real world/virtual space/fantasy/null)
- **region**: Region (e.g., "Paris," "Fantasy Continent," "East Coast")
- **main_location**: Main setting (e.g., "Train Station," "Forest," "Palace")
- **time_period**: Time information (e.g., "Night," "Early Spring," "Future")
- **summary**: A one-sentence plot summary of the chapter

**Return format (strictly follows JSON):**
```json
{
  "metadata": {
    "space": "Real world/virtual space/fantasy/null",
    "region": "Region information or null",
    "main_location": "Main setting location or null",
    "time_period": "Time information or null",
    "summary": "A one-sentence plot summary"
  }
}
```

Please strictly follow the JSON output format and do not add any comments or instructions.
